USA, you can now trade GYEN, ZUSD, BONK, and SUI on Bitstamp
Bitstamp adds GYEN, ZUSD, BONK, and SUI to its lineup in the USA. Learn what these new assets offer and why they’re worth exploring.

You can now trade GYEN, ZUSD, BONK, and SUI on Bitstamp in the USA, including in New York State.

If you’re looking for new stablecoin options, we’ve got GYEN and ZUSD – both backed 1:1 by fiat currencies. If community favorites are your thing, BONK is a popular pick in the meme coin world. And if you’re all about innovation, SUI is helping build the next generation of decentralized apps.

Start trading new assets in the US today

We’re listing the following trading pairs:

GYEN/USD

ZUSD/USD

BONK/USD

SUI/USD

More about GYEN

GYEN is the world’s first regulated Japanese Yen stablecoin, issued by the reputable GMO-Z.com Trust Company and regulated by the New York Department of Financial Services (NYDFS). Each GYEN is backed 1:1 by the Japanese Yen. For anyone looking to diversify their portfolio with a globally recognized currency, GYEN is a solid choice.

Learn more in our article What is GYEN?

More about ZUSD

Just like GYEN, ZUSD is also issued by GMO-Z.com Trust Company, but it’s pegged to the US Dollar. This gives you the reliability of the USD, with the flexibility and speed of cryptocurrency. With strong regulatory backing, ZUSD might be an interesting option for you.

Learn more in our article What is ZUSD?

More about SUI

SUI is a next gen blockchain designed to support the future of decentralized apps (dApps). As the world’s first permissionless Layer 1 blockchain, SUI stands out with its ability to process simple transactions in parallel, making it faster and more scalable than many other blockchains. The native token, SUI, is used to power the network. It helps pay for transaction fees, rewards validators for securing the network, and keeps everything running smoothly.

Learn more in our article What is SUI?

More about BONK

BONK is a meme coin that has gained popularity within the Solana community, known for its dog-themed branding and active social engagement. Created as an alternative to traditional financial systems, BONK encourages community involvement, allowing users to take part in governance and decision-making. It’s a platform that emphasizes accessibility and participation in the crypto space.

Learn more in our article What is BONK?

Ready to explore these new assets?

We’re dedicated to bringing diverse options to our US customers, and these listings do just that.
